doc.author: duanximeng
doc.description: 投诉申告前后台处理统计

sql.name: Tscr_form_sum
sql.item:
select a.处理客服, a.工单生成, b.派单量, c.及时派单量, round(c.及时派单量/(case when b.派单量=0 then 1 else b.派单量 end),4)*100 || '%' as 及时派单率, d.处理量, e.及时处理量, round(e.及时处理量/(case when d.处理量=0 then 1 else d.处理量 end),4)*100 || '%' as 及时处理率, f.反馈量, g.及时反馈量, round(g.及时反馈量/(case when f.反馈量=0 then 1 else f.反馈量 end),4)*100 || '%' as 及时反馈率 from (select b.处理客服, nvl(a.工单生成,0) as 工单生成 from (select distinct(ltrim(g.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(distinct(comp.c1)) as 工单生成 from {100} comp,(select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) pro,{500} u,{400} g where comp.C1=pro.C700020001 and comp.c700000010<>'已作废' and pro.C700020004='BEGIN' and comp.C700000005=u.C630000001 and u.c630000013=g.c1 {3} {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select t.C630000018 as 处理客服 from {400} t where t.C630000021='2') b where a.处理客服(+)=b.处理客服) a, (select b.处理客服, nvl(a.派单量,0) as 派单量 from (select distinct(ltrim(g.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(distinct(comp.c1)) as 派单量 from {100} comp,(select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) pro,{500} u,{400} g where comp.C1=pro.C700020001 and comp.c700000010<>'已作废' and (pro.C801000101=1 or pro.C801000101=4) and comp.C700000005=u.C630000001 and u.c630000013=g.c1 {3} {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select t.C630000018 as 处理客服 from {400} t where t.C630000021='2' and ((t.C630000018 like '%分公司%') or (t.C630000018 like '%区客服%') or (t.C630000018 like '%河北移动%') and (t.C630000018 <>'administrator') and (t.C630000018 <>'神州泰岳') and (t.C630000018 <>'河北移动通讯股份有限公司'))) b where a.处理客服(+)=b.处理客服) b, (select b.处理客服, nvl(a.及时派单量,0) as 及时派单量 from (select distinct(ltrim(g.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(distinct(comp.c1)) as 及时派单量 from {100} comp,(select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) pro,{500} u,{400} g where comp.C1=pro.C700020001 and comp.c700000010<>'已作废' and (pro.C801000101=1 or pro.C801000101=4) and pro.C700020017-pro.C700020014<=0 and comp.C700000005=u.C630000001 and u.c630000013=g.c1 and pro.c801000103=0 {3} {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select t.C630000018 as 处理客服 from {400} t where t.C630000021='2' and ((t.C630000018 like '%分公司%') or (t.C630000018 like '%区客服%') or (t.C630000018 like '%河北移动%') and (t.C630000018 <>'administrator') and (t.C630000018 <>'神州泰岳') and (t.C630000018 <>'河北移动通讯股份有限公司'))) b where a.处理客服(+)=b.处理客服) c, (select b.处理客服, nvl(a.处理量,0) as 处理量 from (select distinct(ltrim(g.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(distinct(comp.C1)) as 处理量 from {100} comp,(select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) pro,{500} u,{400} g where comp.C1=pro.C700020001 and comp.c700000010<>'已作废' and pro.C801000101 in (5,6,7,9) and comp.C700000005=u.C630000001 and u.c630000013=g.c1 {3} {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select t.C630000018 as 处理客服 from {400} t where t.C630000021='2' and ((t.C630000018 like '%分公司%') or (t.C630000018 like '%区客服%') or (t.C630000018 like '%河北移动%') and (t.C630000018 <>'administrator') and (t.C630000018 <>'神州泰岳') and (t.C630000018 <>'河北移动通讯股份有限公司'))) b where a.处理客服(+)=b.处理客服) d, (select b.处理客服, nvl(a.及时处理量,0) as 及时处理量 from (select distinct(ltrim(g.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(distinct(comp.C1)) as 及时处理量 from {100} comp,(select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) pro,{500} u,{400} g where comp.C1=pro.C700020001 and comp.c700000010<>'已作废' and pro.C801000101 in (5,6,7,9) and pro.C700020017-pro.C700020014<=0 and comp.C700000005=u.C630000001 and u.c630000013=g.c1 and pro.c801000103=0 {3} {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select t.C630000018 as 处理客服 from {400} t where t.C630000021='2' and ((t.C630000018 like '%分公司%') or (t.C630000018 like '%区客服%') or (t.C630000018 like '%河北移动%') and (t.C630000018 <>'administrator') and (t.C630000018 <>'神州泰岳') and (t.C630000018 <>'河北移动通讯股份有限公司'))) b where a.处理客服(+)=b.处理客服) e,
(select b.处理客服, nvl(a.反馈量,0) as 反馈量 from (select distinct(ltrim(gg.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(comp.C1) as 反馈量 from {100} comp,(select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) pro,{500} uu,{400} gg , (select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) tt where comp.C1=pro.C700020001
and comp.C1=tt.C700020001 and pro.C700020001=tt.C700020001 and comp.C1=tt.C700020001 and comp.C700000005=uu.C630000001 and uu.c630000013=gg.c1 and pro.C801000101=8 and pro.C700020019<>20 and pro.c700020003=tt.c700020004 and pro.C700020017>tt.C700020017 and comp.c700000010<>'已作废' -- and pro.C700020010=u.C630000001 -- and u.C1=gu.C620000028 -- and gu.C620000027=gg.C1 {3} {5} group by gg.c630000018) a, (select t.C630000018 as 处理客服 from {400} t where t.C630000021='2' and ((t.C630000018 like '%分公司%') or (t.C630000018 like '%区客服%') or (t.C630000018 like '%河北移动%') and (t.C630000018 <>'administrator') and (t.C630000018 <>'神州泰岳') and (t.C630000018 <>'河北移动通讯股份有限公司'))) b where a.处理客服(+)=b.处理客服) f,
(select b.处理客服, nvl(a.及时反馈量,0) as 及时反馈量 from (select distinct(ltrim(gg.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(comp.C1) as 及时反馈量 from {100} comp,(select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) pro,{500} uu,{400} gg , (select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) tt where comp.C1=pro.C700020001
and comp.C1=tt.C700020001 and pro.C700020001=tt.C700020001 and comp.C1=tt.C700020001 and comp.C700000005=uu.C630000001 and uu.c630000013=gg.c1 and pro.C801000101=8 and pro.C700020019<>20 and pro.c700020003=tt.c700020004 and pro.C700020017>tt.C700020017 and comp.c700000010<>'已作废' and nvl(pro.C700020017,((to_date( to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')-to_date('1970-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) * 3600 * 24)) -tt.c700020017<=2*3600 --and pro.C700020010=u.C630000001 --and u.C1=gu.C620000028 --and gu.C620000027=gg.C1 and pro.c801000103=0
{3} {5} group by gg.c630000018) a, (select t.C630000018 as 处理客服 from {400} t where t.C630000021='2' and ((t.C630000018 like '%分公司%') or (t.C630000018 like '%区客服%') or (t.C630000018 like '%河北移动%') and (t.C630000018 <>'administrator') and (t.C630000018 <>'神州泰岳') and (t.C630000018 <>'河北移动通讯股份有限公司'))) b where a.处理客服(+)=b.处理客服) g where a.处理客服=b.处理客服 and b.处理客服=c.处理客服 and c.处理客服=d.处理客服 and d.处理客服=e.处理客服 and e.处理客服=f.处理客服 and f.处理客服=g.处理客服
union all
select '合计',(select sum(a.工单生成) as 工单生成 from (select b.处理客服, nvl(a.工单生成,0) as 工单生成 from (select distinct(ltrim(g.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(distinct(comp.c1)) as 工单生成 from {100} comp,(select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) pro,{500} u,{400} g where comp.C1=pro.C700020001 and comp.c700000010<>'已作废' and pro.C700020004='BEGIN' and comp.C700000005=u.C630000001 and u.c630000013=g.c1 {3} {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select t.C630000018 as 处理客服 from {400} t where t.C630000021='2' and ((t.C630000018 like '%分公司%') or (t.C630000018 like '%区客服%') or (t.C630000018 like '%河北移动%') and 派单量 from (select distinct(ltrim(g.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(distinct(comp.c1)) as 派单量 from {100} comp,(select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) pro,{500} u,{400} g where distinct(ltrim(g.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(distinct(comp.c1)) as 及时派单量 from {100} comp,(select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) pro,{500} u,{400} g where comp.C1=pro.C700020001 and comp.c700000010<>'已作废' and (pro.C801000101=1 or pro.C801000101=4) and pro.C700020017-pro.C700020014<=0 and comp.C700000005=u.C630000001 and u.c630000013=g.c1 and pro.c801000103=0 {3} {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select t.C630000018 as 处理客服 from {400} t where t.C630000021='2' and ((t.C630000018 like '%分公司%') or (t.C630000018 like '%区客服%') or (t.C630000018 like '%河北移动%') and (t.C630000018 <>'administrator') and (t.C630000018 <>'神州泰岳') and (t.C630000018 <>'河北移动通讯股份有限公司'))) b where a.处理客服(+)=b.处理客服) a ) as 及时派单量, (select round(a.及时派单量/(case when b.派单量=0 then 1 else b.派单量 end),4)*100 || '%' as 及时派单率 from (select sum(a.及时派单量) as 及时派单量 from (select b.处理客服, nvl(a.及时派单量,0) as 及时派单量 from (select distinct(ltrim(g.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(distinct(comp.c1)) as 及时派单量 from {100} comp,(select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) pro,{500} u,{400} g where comp.C1=pro.C700020001 and comp.c700000010<>'已作废' and (pro.C801000101=1 or pro.C801000101=4) and pro.C700020017-pro.C700020014<=0 and comp.C700000005=u.C630000001 and u.c630000013=g.c1 and pro.c801000103=0 {3} {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select t.C630000018 as 处理客服 from {400} t where <>'河北移动通讯股份有限公司'))) b where a.处理客服(+)=b.处理客服) a) a, (select sum(b.派单量) as 派单量 from( select b.处理客服, nvl(a.派单量,0) as 派单量 from (select distinct(ltrim(g.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(distinct(comp.c1)) as comp.C700000005=u.C630000001 and u.c630000013=g.c1 {3} {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select t.C630000018 as 处理客服 from {400} t where t.C630000021='2' and ((t.C630000018 like '%分公司%') or (t.C630000018 like '%区客服%') or (t.C630000018 like '%河北移动%') and (t.C630000018 <>'administrator') and (t.C630000018 <>'神州泰岳') and (t.C630000018 <>'河北移动通讯股份有限公司'))) b where a.处理客服(+)=b.处理客服) b) b) as 及时派单率, (select sum(a.处理量) as 处理量 from (select b.处理客服, nvl(a.处理量,0) as 处理量 from (select distinct(ltrim(g.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(distinct(comp.C1)) as 处理量 from {100} comp,(select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) pro,{500} u,{400} g where comp.C1=pro.C700020001 and comp.c700000010<>'已作废' and pro.C801000101 in (5,6,7,9) and comp.C700000005=u.C630000001 and u.c630000013=g.c1 {3} {5} group by from (select distinct(ltrim(g.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(distinct(comp.C1)) as 及时处理量 from {100} comp,(select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) pro,{500} u,{400} g where end),4)*100 || '%' as 及时处理率 from (select sum(a.及时处理量) as 及时处理量 from (select b.处理客服, nvl(a.及时处理量,0) as 及时处理量 from (select distinct(ltrim(g.c630000018,0)) as 处理客服, count(distinct(comp.C1)) as 及时处理量 from {300}) pro,{500} uu,{400} gg , (select * from {200} union all select * from {300}) tt where comp.C1=pro.C700020001
